name: add-inpsiration-raycast-plugin
title: Vogelino Utils
description: Utilities to see and add cool sites to vogelino's portfolio.
author: vogelino

commands.name: addInspiration
commands.title: Add Cool Site
commands.subtitle: Add a cool site to vogelino's portfolio "inspirations" page.
commands.description: Add a cool site to vogelino's portfolio "inspirations" page by providing an URL, Name and list of coma-separated tags.

commands.name: index
commands.title: Search/List Cool Sites
commands.subtitle: List and search throught vogelino's portfolio Cool Sites.
commands.description: List and search throught vogelino's portfolio Cool Sites.

preferences.name: githubAuthToken
preferences.title: GitHub Auth Token
preferences.description: Get your Auth Token here https://github.com/settings/tokens
